Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{3: "The night—'tis the time to rest and sleep for humans as 'tis time to get creative juices flowing for mechanoids."}
{3: "Being where the Palette Clash transpires, this place has driven away every last human and mechanoid that couldn't stand the constant hubbub."}
{3: 'An arrow with fireworks tied to it swishes into the sky, leaving in its wake a piercing hiss before it parts ways with the world in a loud explosion.'}
{3: "Standing on the rooftop, Alisa takes care in shooting every arrow with just the right amount of force so the fireworks tied to it don't come off as soon as the arrow leaves the bow."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alisa', 3: 'Oh my, what in the world am I even doing here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: '...Is this some sort of revenge?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Busy trying to teach Dulcinea how to make fireworks, you don't answer Alisa's question."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "I think I'm getting the hang of it now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'I just need you to go through it again for me, Commandant, so I can record what you do and do it myself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Constellia probably has some of the best students in the world...'}
{3: 'Because after watching you work through the fireworks just twice, Dulcinea is now effectively producing her own at the speed of a fireworks production line.'}
{3: 'She looks over at you, all the while working faster still.'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'What now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mechanoids are nothing short of a miracle, and you can only imagine how much more impactful than Constructs their presence will be to humanity down the road...'}
{3: "Except you know you should focus on what's at hand now."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alisa', 3: 'Hey, check out all the mechanoids in the square now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are they saying anything?', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: "I'm going to strangle whoever thought it'd be a good idea to do this in the middle of the night—that is probably what they're saying.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: "Should I go ahead and read you everything they're saying? Happy to do the honor.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, just spare me all that.', 3: '32'}
{3: 'Looking down from the rooftop, you see a few awakened machines that have found this place following the trajectory of the arrows.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'Good grief, are you done yet?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: "We have an artist of a lifetime in the making here—and you're just goofing around with those stupid fireworks trying to nip the next Rembrandt in the bud, huh?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The fireworks seem to be working wonders.'}

{3: "Nothing puts the Awakened Machines in mechanoids' and humans' shoes better than having them experience firsthand what it's like getting drowned in all the noises when they crave a break right after a battle."}
{3: 'Now, a little more stirring up and "chaos" to tire them out is all that\'s going to take to get them to agree to Dulcinea\'s proposal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alisa', 3: "I can't believe we're putting on this child's play...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: "I feel like we're just a bunch of kids causing a scene here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Well, we might be causing a scene here... but I think this is going somewhere.', 4: '2'}

{3: 'And it should really hit no one that this is working. Everyone understands what brought about the Palette Clash in the first place, and everyone stood by the mechanoids when they decided to fight fate with the arts.'}
{3: "Still, the mechanoids' attempt came off as childish to some humans—and what you're doing now is just tit for tat."}
{3: 'Alisa looks at Dulcinea with squinted eyes, wondering what went into making her and giving her the ability to see through things...'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: 'Resentment can mount entirely unnoticed, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: "And that's exactly what's happening—Task Force, Engineering Force, and WGAA haven't been happy at all. They don't see why they need to do as told, and they believe humans get to be angry, too."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '"Finish this painting, use it to deliver what I wants to say, and send it out."', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}

{3: "The fireworks carry more than just hopes that humanity and awakened machines will eventually come to embrace each other, though—they're also meant to tell the awakened machines just how ****ing sick and tired those working at the frontlines are."}
{3: "Bursting out laughing, Alisa quickly covers her mouth with her hand, thinking that it's out of keeping with proper manners."}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: 'So "shooting fireworks at their camp at midnight" is your idea of a piece of performance art, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: 'Totally understand you there, Commandant. Nothing says "We care about you!" better than a flurry of fireworks, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: 'Goofing around sometimes with those awakened machines might help us even more with our cause, I suppose.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Let's keep going, then.", 3: '79'}
{2: "Gotta put 'em machines in our shoes, yeah?", 3: '80'}
{2: 'Alisa', 3: 'Of course, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alisa takes the bundle of arrows that you pass her and places three on her bow.'}
{3: 'Already high up in the skies before you know it, the shooting stars flower glaringly across the black canvas above...'}
{3: 'This is perhaps one of the ways in which humans actually partake in the Palette Clash.'}
